price: 2. Waxaana siinnay Muuse Kitaabka (Towraadda) oo aan uga yeelnay hanuun Ilmahii Israa’iil (Annagoo leh): Ha ka yeelannina cidaan Aniga (Alle) aheyn wakiil aad tala saarataan oo isku halleeysaan3.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ أَلَّا تَتَّخِذُواْ مِن دُونِي وَكِيلٗا
footnotes: 3. Waa inaad ku kalsoonaataan oo isku halleysaan Alle oo tala saarataan idinkoo yaqiinsan inuu Alle subxaanahu wa tacaalaa yahay Kan haya wax iyo arrin walba xilkood oo idin xafida.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wajaʿalnāhu hudan libanī is'rāīla allā tattakhidhū min dūnī wakīlan
